0.text: Innate: When Varus kills an enemy, he gains  10 / 15 / 20% (based on level) (+ 20% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 (based on level) seconds, increased to 40% (+ 40% bonus attack speed) upon scoring an enemy  champion  takedown.
0.html: Innate: When Varus kills an enemy, he gains  10 / 15 / 20% (based on level) (+ 20% bonus attack speed) bonus attack speed for 5 / 7 / 9 / 11 (based on level) seconds, increased to 40% (+ 40% bonus attack speed) upon scoring an enemy champion takedown.

0.text: Active: Varus  charges while being  slowed by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase Piercing Arrow's  range and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
0.html: Active: Varus charges while being slowed by 20% for up to 4 seconds to increase Piercing Arrow's  range and damage over the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
markedPassages: charges
slowed
range

1.text: Piercing Arrow can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is cancelled and refunds  50% of the mana cost.
1.html: Piercing Arrow can be recast within the duration. If the charge completes without reactivation, Piercing Arrow is cancelled and refunds  50% of the mana cost.
markedPassages: 50% of the mana cost

2.text: Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated  Blight stacks are   increased by 0% − 50% (based on channel time), and the arrow's damage is reduced by 0% − 67% (based on enemies hit).
2.html: Recast: Varus fires a piercing arrow in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit. The damage of the arrow as well as any detonated Blight stacks are increased by 0% − 50% (based on channel time), and the arrow's damage is reduced by 0% − 67% (based on enemies hit).
markedPassages: Blight

0.text: Passive: Varus' basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Blight  on-hit for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. Varus'  abilities consume all Blight stacks on enemies hit to apply the effect.
0.html: Passive: Varus' basic attacks are empowered to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of Blight on-hit for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications and stacking up to 3 times. Varus' abilities consume all Blight stacks on enemies hit to apply the effect.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: Blight: For each stack consumed, the target is dealt bonus magic damage. Against a  champion or epic  monster, this also reduces his basic abilities'  current cooldowns by 12% of the total cooldown for each stack, up to 36% per target. This damage is capped at 360 against  monsters.
1.html: Blight: For each stack consumed, the target is dealt bonus magic damage. Against a champion or epic monster, this also reduces his basic abilities'  current cooldowns by 12% of the total cooldown for each stack, up to 36% per target. This damage is capped at 360 against monsters.

2.text: Active: Varus' next  Piercing Arrow within 5.5 seconds is empowered to deal 6% − 14% (based on level) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage, increased by 0% − 50% (based on Piercing Arrow's channel time), for a maximum of 9% − 21% (based on level) of the target's missing health. This damage is capped at 360 against  monsters.

3.text: If Varus does not cast  Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when he dies. Blighted Quiver can be cast during the first 0.25 seconds of  Piercing Arrow's charge, and will be placed on full cooldown even if  Piercing Arrow is not recast.
3.html: If Varus does not cast Piercing Arrow, Blighted Quiver can be recast after 1 second within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards or when he dies. Blighted Quiver can be cast during the first 0.25 seconds of Piercing Arrow's charge, and will be placed on full cooldown even if Piercing Arrow is not recast.
markedPassages: Piercing Arrow

4.text: Recast: Varus ends Blighted Quiver and places it on a 1-second cooldown.
4.html: Recast: Varus ends Blighted Quiver and places it on a 1-second cooldown.

5.text: Blighted Quiver's active and recast can both be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
5.html: Blighted Quiver's active and recast can both be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control

0.text: Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location that land after 0.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Varus fires a hail of arrows at the target location that land after 0.5 seconds, dealing physical damage to enemies hit.

1.text: The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds,  slowing enemies within and inflicting them with  Grievous Wounds.
1.html: The area then becomes desecrated for 4 seconds, slowing enemies within and inflicting them with Grievous Wounds.
markedPassages: slowing
Grievous Wounds

2.text: Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Hail of Arrows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Varus unleashes a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage and  rooting them for 2 seconds, during which they are  revealed. Over the first 1.5 seconds, they are also inflicted with maximum stacks of  Blight.
0.html: Active: Varus unleashes a tendril of corruption in the target direction that infects the first enemy champion hit, dealing magic damage and rooting them for 2 seconds, during which they are revealed. Over the first 1.5 seconds, they are also inflicted with maximum stacks of Blight.
markedPassages: rooting
revealed
Blight

1.text: Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out nearby enemy  champions. If a target does not leave the area within 2 seconds, they subsequently become infected as well, taking the same damage and effects. A new tendril is then spread out from the infected target that is closest to a nearby uninfected enemy champion. The infection can spread repeatedly until there are no new targets.
1.html: Upon impact, the tendril roots into the ground from which it seeks out nearby enemy champions. If a target does not leave the area within 2 seconds, they subsequently become infected as well, taking the same damage and effects. A new tendril is then spread out from the infected target that is closest to a nearby uninfected enemy champion. The infection can spread repeatedly until there are no new targets.
markedPassages: champions

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be caught by the tendril.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible to be caught by the tendril.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible to be caught by the tendril.
